name: Goku
description: Goku is the main protagonist of the Dragon Ball series. He is a Saiyan who fights to protect Earth.

name: Vegeta
description: Vegeta is the prince of the fallen Saiyan race and the rival of Goku.

name: Frieza
description: Frieza is one of the most powerful and feared villains in the Dragon Ball universe.

name: Piccolo
description: Piccolo is a wise and powerful Namekian who once fought Goku but later became an ally.
